comments:

editor is too complicated.  The following errors show up in the .log:

Setting the tabIcon property on JTabPane's children also has similar parsing
problems as well.

The allocation is an InitStringAllocation and should be a ParseTreeAllocation.
Needs bug 59314 fixed in order to work.

The original problem no longer occurs, but you now get an exception in the log
at the time of the apply from the Icon property editor.

Created an attachment (id=25383)
log of the error

\

Was able to set iconImage for the frame without any exceptions. Please reopen if
it still occurs detailing exact steps to reproduce.
